column4: Hello. Is there a problem if I update libusb-1.0.0 in lucid to a greater version (compile from source)?
you can install to /urs/local and the LD_LIBRARY_PATH or LD_PRELOAD
can you give me some more info please/
LD_LIBRARY_PATH is an environmental variable that allows you to tell ld-linux and vdso where to search for libraries.
